title: Union Apts-Newly Remodeled Studio Available...Prime Location!
map_address: 1330 S. Union Ave near Pico Boulevard
posting_body: Newly remodeled studio.
All new lighting and plumbing fixtures.
Cabinets with quartz counter top.
Ceiling fan.
Heater.
Custom paint colors throughout unit that give the unit a warm, soft feel.
Prime location.
Gets plenty of natural light.
All utilities included .
Pets allowed.
Approximately 400 Sq.
Ft.
Close To Pico Blvd - Easy Access to Public Transportation, and 10; 110 Fwy.
A few blocks From LA Live, Staples Center, Convention Center, New Courtyard Marriott & City TARGET.
Walk To Curacao Business Center.
7th Street Metro Station @ 7th St. & Figueroa St and Pico Blue Line Station @ Pico Blvd & Figueroa St.
Cats allowed with an additional $200 deposit and dogs with an additional $300 deposit.
Professionally Managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).
Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.
